string.value: Looks like Dad has something he wants to say...
Dad says that Mom probably knows best about how to raise a egg. He tells you to #bgo home and ask Mom#k. While you're at it, he asks you to return his #t4032450#.
After delivering the #t4032450#, you asked Mom about raising an egg. She said that you can raise it in an incubator... #p1013101# seems to know something about an incubator.
If you want to learn about hatching eggs, you should head #bhome#k and ask #bMom#k. She raises all our chickens, so she'd know. Also...
Since you're going home, return this #b#t4032450##k to your mother. I have so much work to do, I may not get home until late tonight.
Hmm. #p1013101# would have been more than willing...
Evan, you're back? Ah, you brought back the #t4032450#. You're such a good kid. Huh? How do you raise an egg?
There are many ways, but the simplest is to use an Incubator. Come to think of it, I think I saw #b#p1013101##k with one. Why don't you ask #p1013101# to lend it to you?
You haven't returned to your #bmother#k yet? #t4032450#es should be cleaned right away.
You're back, Evan? Is #bDad#k busy? I wish he would return the #b#t4032450##k so I could wash it...
Now, now, it looks like you dropped the #t4032450#. It's a good thing I found it. I wonder where who your clumsiness comes from. Must be your mother's side. Here, why don't you take this #bhome#k.
